## Checklist
- [ ] Ran `npm run dev` locally and verified behavior
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds without errors
- [ ] Updated tests/docs if needed
- [ ] No deploy changes (Pages) unless explicitly intended

## Deployment
Merging to `main` triggers GitHub Pages deployment. Keep PRs targeting `main` and avoid direct pushes.
